info.name: 3DALLTEXT
info.description: All the text go 3D and all the sites have depth! Have fun! The larger the size of the text, the more it pops out. 🍺 To support us, you can buy us a beer! Good Examples to be anaglyph so I tested on: - <h1>–<h6>: The HTML Section Heading elements (MDN) - MDN Web Docs - anaglyph - Google Search You should be interested in also: - Anaglyph Drawing App - Wall Paper - アナグリフとは (ニコニコ大百科) - 立体写真・ステレオ写真用品の通信販売 'STEREOeYe SHOP'
